Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Founded in 2017, Asiabots is headquartered in Hong Kong and has offices in Taiwan, Macau, and Canada. Asiabots specializes in developing AI and voice technologies. Its natural language processing (NLP) and automatic speech recognition (ASR) technologies support over 20 languages, including Cantonese, Mandarin, and English. Its text-to-speech (TTS) engine is also widely acclaimed. Asiabots provides multi-channel conversational AI customer service, including AI ambassadors, chatbots, brand ambassadors, and translation services.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
1.	Speech & Language Data
	•	Voice recordings, transcripts, and text scripts for ASR/NLP/TTS training.
	•	Covers 20+ languages (Cantonese, Mandarin, English, etc.).
	2.	Conversational Data
	•	Chat logs, intent labels, dialogue flows, and multi-channel interactions (web, phone, chatbot).
	3.	System & Performance Data
	•	Model accuracy, response time, usage metrics, and API call logs.
	4.	Client & Domain Data
	•	Enterprise customer info, customized industry vocabularies, translation pairs.
	5.	Privacy-Related Data
	•	May include user names, contact details, or voice clips; subject to PDPO/GDPR compliance.
